aboutUsPage.title: Who Are We?
aboutUsPage.subtitle: MLC Engineering
aboutUsPage.paragraph1: Is an engineering company specialized in the creation and international marketing of a continuous glucose monitoring system.
aboutUsPage.image1Caption: Choose your investment amount. Investment amounts range from $100 to $2,000,000.
aboutUsPage.image2Caption: A certificate will be given to you at the end of your investments in the project, a document that proves you hold shares in MLC before its IPO in 2030.
aboutUsPage.image3Caption: Our offer is the primary goal of the project; there are 537 million potential consumers on our planet, and we will increase our sales year after year.
